changes: Pending
fixes: Cleaned up Junos API error messages

changes: Added version number to 'about' page
Fixed light/dark mode suppot to the table on the 'about' page
Fixed style template conflicts
Rebranded as 'Firewall Management'
Added a changelog to the 'about' page
Added admin and helpdesk roles to the 'settings' page
Added support for SRX objects (addresses/groups, applications, and services/service groups)
Added GP VPN session count
Added device vendor drop down when adding or editing a device
Updated device edit screen to show the saved username, but not password
Hid HA details on devices that don't have HA enabled
Added icons to connect to devices with SSH or HTTPS
Added support to add missing objects to the device (SRX and Palo Alto)
Disabled compare button until two devices are selected
Split loading spinners per device for object loading
Fixed a bug where a refresh would prevent comparisons
Added VPN monitoring to the dashboard
Finished beta release
Support for Palo Alto and SRX firewalls
